Text: Okay!! you have my undivided attention!! Where did this come from...I cant seem to find it...????

im guessing this is an EXTREMLEY stupid reskinn of the green glass armor that makes it red and stupid, or its a new set armor that is a reskinned copy and  over enchanted version of the green glass armor
